Header: Graduate Teachers and Students Undergo Army 'Leadership Training'
Content: A full-day workshop on leadership training was conducted on Monday (14) by the Army for 59 graduate teachers at the Teachers' Training Centre in Kelaniya, following the approval given by the Commander of the Army. During this leadership programme, teachers were educated on possible improvement of positive thinking, social discipline, skill development, mental harmony and stability, professional guidance and challenging the challenges, etc and subjected to practical exercises. Similarly, students of St. John's College in Dematagoda also underwent one-day training session on Wednesday (16) and learnt ‘how they could be great persons in society while maintaining the best of discipline’.
